title: The Dreaming
description: Fate earns a good name for itself when it brings these two together for shared dreams and sexy days. Dana Carapelli was living the good life with great kids, a successful career writing cookbooks...even her pets were ideal. She wasn't looking to change anything. Fate had other ideas. And those ideas included Joe Jacobs. Joe Jacobs just started over in a new town by buying the biggest ranch he'd ever owned. He and his son weren't looking to change anything. Fate had other ideas. And those ideas included Dana Carapelli. They share a Natural Gift. One that brings them to the height of what true love can achieve and redefines the good life for all of them.
author: Gina Briganti
